name: Google Keep Dark
description: Make the background black and the topbar darker.  About as simple as it gets :)
additional_info:
1.5 - Better CSS through strategery ;)
1.42 - Guess freaking what...
1.41 - Re-freaking-greyed again. The struggle is real...

1.32 - Re-greyed...
1.3 - Re-greyed top bar again, fixed the rounding of the notes, other general improvements.
1.23 - Re-greyed again.
1.22 - Re-greyed top bar again.
1.21 - Re-greyed the top bar.
1.2 - Rounded it out a bit.

1.1 - Changed the font to Roboto Condensed/Sans so it could more easily seen on virtual machines.
